comments_since_last_sample.body: Maybe to some degree, but I think it just changes a lot. Some years are going to have happier pop music than others. I don't think it's really a big trend or anything though.
I hear people saying music is becoming happier. It is both imo
That's what happens when you attack the writer who doesn't want to write. Popular music isn't getting sadder anymore, it's gone, for good.
Popular because the population is sad.
It is true. Also it is getting less and less creative with countless songs being just beats with little to no melody. Also often the beats are the same in multiple songs.
Unless that article was from the mid 70s, not really
